nodes.name: LandPotAuction

struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref
struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Starts a new auction for a new land, contract owner only.
nodes.name: startAuction

nodes.documentation: @dev Starts the free-trade period.
nodes.name: startFreeTrade

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint32 => struct LandPotAuction.Auction storage ref[] storage ref)
struct LandPotAuction.Auction storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Restarts the whole game with new world ID. World ID must be created with World contract first.
nodes.name: restartGame

nodes.documentation: @dev Maps a 2D plot position to a 1D array index. (-3,-3)->(3,3) to 0->49
nodes.name: plotPositionToIndex

nodes.documentation: @dev Converts a a 1D plot array index to 2D position. 0->49 to (-3,-3)->(3,3)
nodes.name: plotIndexToPosition

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets info current auction, for testing only.
nodes.name: getAuction

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets ending time in current auction.
nodes.name: getEndingTime

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets a specific plot in current auction.
nodes.name: getPlot

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref
struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets all plots in current auction.
nodes.name: getPlots

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if auctioning land is (0,0), i.e. bidding closed.
nodes.name: canBid

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Bids on a plot by anyone.
nodes.name: bid

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets all contributed bids at all plots of the current auction.
nodes.name: getMyContributedBids

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct LandPotAuction.Plot storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the max bid of sender at specfic plot.
nodes.name: getMaxBid

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the outbid balance of an address.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the outbid balance of sender.
nodes.name: balanceOfMe

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws all remaining outbid balance of sender.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev Empties the balance of sender, internal use only.
nodes.name: emptyMyBalance

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws the earned ETH while keeping enough for jackpot and outbid balances, owner only.
nodes.name: ownerWithdraw
